meanings.definition: The most extreme or remarkable example of something.
meanings.sent1: In the talent show, Sarah's magic trick was the damnedest of all.
meanings.sent2: That roller coaster is the damnedest ride in the amusement park.
meanings.sent3: The cat chasing its tail is the damnedest thing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise over the mountains was the damnedest sight I've ever seen.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house was the damnedest experience of my life.

meanings.definition: Used for emphasis or to express surprise or disbelief.
meanings.sent1: Well, that is the damnedest thing I've ever heard!
meanings.sent2: The magician pulled a rabbit out of a hat, and the audience exclaimed, 'Well, damnedest!'
meanings.sent3: Damnedest! I can't believe I forgot my keys inside the house.
meanings.sent4: When the cake fell on the floor, she just stood there and said, 'Well, damnedest!'
meanings.sent5: As the alien spaceship landed in the backyard, the farmer shouted, 'Damnedest aliens I've ever seen!'
